movie.title: Tower
movie.description_intro: Nearly fifty years ago, a gunman rode the elevator to the twenty-seventh floor of the University of Texas Tower and opened fire. TOWER, an animated and action-packed documentary, shares the untold story of that day - when the worst in one man brought out the best in so many others.
movie.description_full: Nearly fifty years ago, a gunman rode the elevator to the twenty-seventh floor of the University of Texas Tower and opened fire. TOWER, an animated and action-packed documentary, shares the untold story of that day - when the worst in one man brought out the best in so many others.

movies.title: Escape from Planet Earth
movies.summary: The story takes place on planet Baab where admired astronaut Scorch Supernova (Brendan Fraser) is a national hero to the blue alien population. A master of daring rescues, Scorch pulls off astonishing feats with the quiet aid of his nerdy brother, Gary (Rob Corddry), head of mission control at BASA.

A master of daring rescues, Scorch pulls off astonishing feats with the quiet aid of his nerdy brother, Gary (Rob Corddry), head of mission control at BASA.

movies.title: Phineas and Ferb the Movie: Candace Against the Universe
movies.title_english: Phineas and Ferb the Movie: Candace Against the Universe
movies.title_long: Phineas and Ferb the Movie: Candace Against the Universe (2020)
movies.summary: The famed stepbrother inventors know what they're gonna do today. They're gonna rescue their sister from an alien abduction.
movies.description_full: The famed stepbrother inventors know what they're gonna do today. They're gonna rescue their sister from an alien abduction.

movies.title: Digimon Adventure tri. Part 6: Future
movies.summary: The DigiDestined must stand together to prevent the digital world from swallowing the real world.
movies.description_full: The DigiDestined must stand together to prevent the digital world from swallowing the real world.
movies.synopsis: The DigiDestined must stand together to prevent the digital world from swallowing the real world.

movies.title: The Snow Queen: Mirrorlands
movies.summary: A powerful king nearly lost his family due to the Snow Queen's evil deeds. He finds a way to ban all the magic from the world - all the possessors of magic powers are now trapped in Mirrorlands. The only one who can stop him and keep the fairy-tale in our world is Gerda - as her own biggest power is not magic but her faith in kindness and friendship. In Gerda's new adventures, she will be helped by trolls, pirates and even the Snow Queen herself.
